The National Institutes of Health: NIH) confirmed that there is not enough data to recommend the use of ivermectin for the treatment of Covid-19 in the US.
The Food and Drug Administration: FDA) is the authority responsible for approving drugs in the US, not the NIH.
The Front Line COVID: 19 Critical Care Alliance (FLCCC), a non-profit organization, presented compelling data to the NIH, but the claim that the NIH effectively recommended the drug based on this data is false.
